column2: Bull Centaurs protect that which is claimed under the dominion of Hashut.
Dawi-Zharr sometimes create landmarks of their own to guide their forces and impose on the enemy their dominance.
Forboding and inhospitable to many, lair and mine systems within volcanoes ensures a certain level of protection to those who can stand it.
Mine, smelt, mold and forge. A simple process that can require centuries of mastery.
The Dawi-Zharr are as industrious as they are cruel, their great factories work endlessly to craft their twisted war machines.
Hobgoblins often set up easy to move shanty towns in har to reach places.
Wolf riders rarely break or breed wolves themselves, they leave such dangerous tasks for others.
Larger hobgobln hordes take the shanty approach to their watch posts, able to be pulled apart and moved with great haste upon spotting approaching foes.
The Infernal Guard take up residence in only the harshest of blasted landscapes, and their fortifications match the forboding settings.
A dark obelisk on the horizon, eternally billowing smoke, and eerily lit at night by the red glow of forgefires.
